app.name: Totango Insights
app.short_description: Displays user and account insights from Totango.
app.long_description: Use the Totango widget to display user and accounts insights from Totango about the user and account related to the Zendesk issue you are viewing.
app.installation_instructions: Follow the insructions in the following link to install this app: https://support.totango.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010915-Installing-the-Totango-Zendesk-App

fallback_custom_field.label: Zendesk attribute to match against Totango user id (default is the Zendesk user email)

fallback_totango_attribute.label: Totango Attribute to match against the Zendesk user email (default is the Totango user id)

error.title: An error occurred
error.message: Please try the previous action again.
error.data: Ticket data could not be read.
error.orders: An error occurred when querying users
error.order: An error occurred when querying this user

customer.no_notes: No notes have been added yet.
